title: Print, Design for an altar tabernacle, ca. 1830
description: By A. Moschetti, after Nepoti and Girolamo Contoli. Horizontal rectangle. An altar tabernacle, left, and enlarged detail of one of its decorative capitals, right, and below a plan of the structure. Angels kneel at either side, and above, the crucifix in a domed niche flanked by paired columns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Design for an altar tabernacle, ca. 1830. Engraving. 
1944-36-23
